briefTitle: Trial With Autologous Dendritic Cell Vaccination in Patients With Stage II-III HER2 Negative Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Phase II Trial With Autologous Dendritic Cell Vaccination in Patients With Stage II-III HER2 Negative Breast Cancer
conditions: Stage II Breast Cancer, Stage III Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: pathologic complete response (pCR) in the breast and the axilla
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* HER2 negative and stage II and III Breast cancer patients who benefit with neoadjuvant chemotherapy
* age 18-75
* to get enough tumoral sample to elaborate the vaccine

Exclusion Criteria:

* pregnancy
* severe diseases
* hepatitis or HIV
* need to be on immunosuppressant drugs
